title: go.tools/importer: API lacks method of importing from source and specifying path
body:
I'm working on refactoring llgo to use the ssa package, thus I'm creating and populating
an Importer. llgo works similarly to gc, where it takes a set of (.go) filenames and an
import path.

Something along the lines of LoadMainPackage, but without the hard-coded path, would be
a welcome addition to the API. Maybe just ditch LoadMainPackage, and replace it with
LoadPackage(path string, files ...*ast.File)?
